Summary: Triangle four lights red light in middle tilting three white lights Meriden, CT.
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a very weird screeching type sound when a plane is very low. So as I am into planes I look out of my window and look out.. Waiting and waiting this VERY SLOW triangular object is flying out side of my house toward I think west or north. The object was not well seen, but it had Four Lights. One Red that flashed and three white that I think flashed. Then I saw it tilt alot towards the right and then the left... I was pretty shocked and not scared when I saw it. I lost its visual when it went behind a house and I was not able to see it after. My brother who lives with me heard it but did not see it. I am not sure if anyone else saw it.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Meriden
There were no other sightings in Meriden on or around May 24th 2009
